body: Heads up that switching from calling cmake manually to calling FULL_CAFFE2=1 setup.py will get rid of the ability to forward user cmake flags from scripts/build_anaconda.sh (and so some of the flags passed in our CI script will be ignored and that might be a little confusing debugging). A good fix for this IMO is to change tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh to also allow propogating cmake flags, but we can do that after this is merged.
